item.title: The Truman Show
item.description: Based on the original film by Andrew Niccol Based on the beloved 1998 film, this musical follows Truman, an ordinary man unaware he’s being watched by millions from all over the world. He lives in a large studio with hidden cameras everywhere. All his friends and townspeople are actors playing their roles in the most popular TV-series in the world: “The Truman Show”. When an actress falls in love with him, she breaks onto the set to tell him the truth.
